text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Learning that Air Groove is<n>overseeing a dance lesson for a<n>
group of other students after school, I<n>decide to drop by and
watch.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Stay in formation! First the box step,<n>then the turn! Maintain
eye contact!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: O-okay!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
You're finished if you fall behind<n>tempo! Next is a heel step.
Get ready<n>to come forward!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: O-okay!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While her tone is stern, the instruction<n>is precise. This is an
Air Groove dance<n>lesson through and through.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Okay, let's switch to pair training. Get<n>with a partner and
begin the routine!

text_block_list.name: The Three
text_block_list.text: Okay!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hm? Were you always there?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
The winning concert is an integral part<n>of any
Umamusume's duties.<n>Naturally, dance practice is going to
be<n>tough.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: It's so awesome to get lessons fromthe Air Groove!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume C
text_block_list.text: Can't be sloppy in front of her! Let's<n>do this!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The excited dancer stumbles out of<n>line.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hey, keep your eyes on—you'll fall!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: Eek!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Air Groove rushes over to cushion<n>the girl's fall.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume C
text_block_list.text: Ow ow ow...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: Waaaahhh! Air Groove! Are—are you<n>okay?!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I'm fine... This is nothing to be<n>alarmed by.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After some initial resistance, I<n>convince Air Groove to come
with me<n>to the infirmary.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The physician declares it a minor<n>sprain. There is a little
swelling, but<n>fortunately there's no damage to the<n>
ligaments or bone.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Then there's nothing stopping me<n>from getting back to
work. If you'll<n>excuse me, I have a lesson to teach.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
What do you want? Those girls are<n>counting on me for
instruction. Don't<n>get in my way.
choice_data_list: I'd prefer if you took better care of yourself.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Better care? I think I've got that<n>under control, thank you.
You've no<n>grounds to be telling me how to take<n>care of
myself.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
An empress cannot abandon those in<n>need for anything. A
mere scratch is<n>no reason to—
choice_data_list:
You're hurt! What could be more important than
that?!

You're hurt! What could be more important than
that?!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
B-back off! I could hear you where<n>you were standing
before.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Oh please, stop with that face. Geez,<n>what's gotten into
you?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I suppose... Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Fine. I'll take the rest of the day off<n>and let them know
we'll resume<n>practice at a later date.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
It won't do for an empress to allow<n>her audience to see her
in anything<n>less than an ideal state.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
...And I suppose causing anxiety for<n>one's trainer isn't very
empress-like<n>either.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: All right, enough talk! I'm going to nap<n>here for a while.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Well, off you go then. Do you want<n>me to get some rest or
not?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I happily allow myself to be kicked<n>out of the infirmary.
